action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson of Georgia (for himself and Mr. Sablan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require the establishment of defender organizations by Federal judicial districts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Access to Justice Act of 2022.
Section 3006A(g)(1) of title 18, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the heading, by striking Qualifications and inserting Requirement;
in the first sentence, by striking or a part of a district in which at least two hundred persons annually require the appointment of counsel may and inserting shall; and

by striking the second sentence and inserting the following: Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, 2 adjacent districts or parts of districts may establish a single defender organization to serve both areas..
